error.pageNotFoundDesc: Tá brón orainn, ní bhíonn an leathanach a bhfuil tú ag cuardach air ann.
error.helpText: Má cheapann tú gur earráid é seo, déan teagmháil linn le do thoil.

seo.defaultTitle: Innéacs Cáilíochta Aeir (AQI) - Monatóireacht Cáilíochta Aeir Fíor-ama do Chathracha Domhanda | AirQuality.Tools
seo.defaultDescription: Soláthraíonn AirQuality.Tools sonraí monatóireachta Innéacs Cáilíochta Aeir (AQI) fíor-ama do phríomhchathracha an domhain, ag tacú le hiarratais ó níos mó ná 100 cathair cosúil le Beijing, Shanghai, Guangzhou, Shenzhen, New York, Londain, Páras, srl., ag cabhrú leat aire a thabhairt do shaol sláintiúil. Monatóireacht fíor-ama truailleán cosúil le PM2.5, PM10, ózón, srl.
seo.defaultKeywords: cáilíocht aeir, AQI, monatóireacht fíor-ama, cathracha domhanda, comhshaol, sláinte, PM2.5, PM10, truailleán aeir, aimsir

whatIsAQI.question: What is AQI?
whatIsAQI.answer: The Air Quality Index (AQI) is a standardized measure used to report daily air quality. It tells you how clean or polluted your air is, and what associated health effects might be a concern for you.

whatIsPM25.question: What is PM2.5?
whatIsPM25.answer: PM2.5 refers to fine particulate matter with a diameter of 2.5 micrometers or less. These particles are small enough to penetrate deep into the lungs and can cause serious health problems.

dataSource.question: What are the data sources and update frequency?
dataSource.answer: AirQuality.Tools data comes from authoritative meteorological and environmental monitoring agencies, usually updated hourly to ensure accuracy.

howToQuery.question: How to check air quality in a city?
howToQuery.answer: Enter the city name on the AirQuality.Tools homepage and click 'Search' to get real-time air quality data for that city.

healthImpact.question: Does air quality affect health?
healthImpact.answer: Air pollution increases the risk of respiratory and cardiovascular diseases, especially for children, the elderly, and sensitive groups. Pay attention to air quality and maintain a healthy lifestyle.

science.title: Eolaíocht AirQuality | Eolas ar Cháilíocht Aeir
science.intro: Fáilte go Eolaíocht AirQuality! Foghlaim anseo faoi cháilíocht aeir (airquality), AQI, truailliú agus conas do shláinte a chosaint.
science.footer: Cuidíonn Eolaíocht AirQuality (cáilíocht aeir) le tuiscint a fháil ar thábhacht an aeir ghlain agus ar an tionchar a bhíonn ag cáilíocht aeir ar an saol.
science.sourceContent: Air pollution mainly comes from industrial emissions, vehicle exhaust, construction dust, coal burning, and domestic waste incineration. The structure of pollution sources may vary by city and season.
science.impactTitle: Impact of Air Quality on Different Groups
science.impactContent: Air pollution has a greater impact on children, the elderly, pregnant women, and people with respiratory diseases. Long-term exposure to high pollution increases health risks significantly.
science.protect1: Reduce outdoor activities when air pollution is severe, especially during rush hours.
science.protect2: Wear protective masks (such as N95) when going out.
science.protect3: Use air purifiers indoors and keep rooms ventilated.
science.protect4: Follow authoritative air quality forecasts and adjust travel and exercise plans in time.
science.trendContent: In recent years, air quality in some cities has improved, but winter and heavy pollution days still require vigilance. Globally, developed countries generally have better air quality, while some cities in developing countries face more serious pollution.
science.policyContent: Governments improve air quality through emission limits, promotion of new energy, and urban greening. The public can also contribute by choosing green travel and saving energy.
science.seoTitle: Eolaíocht AirQuality | Ailt ar Cháilíocht Aeir agus AirQuality
science.seoDesc: Ailt eolaíochta AirQuality (cáilíocht aeir): foghlaim faoi innéacs cáilíochta aeir (AQI), truailliú agus tionchair sláinte ar fud an domhain.
science.seoKeywords: airquality, cáilíocht aeir, eolaíocht, AQI, ailt airquality, innéacs cáilíochta aeir
